actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To authorize funds for the use by the United States Customs Service of high energy container x-ray systems and automated targeting systems for inspection of cargo at major checkpoints along the borders of the United States that are contiguous with other countries.
short_title: Eliminating Narcotics and Drugs With Innovative Technology Act

summary.text: Eliminating Narcotics and Drugs with Innovative Technology Act - Authorizes appropriations for United States Customs Service use of high energy container x-ray systems and automated targeting systems at major checkpoints to verify commercial cargo entering the United States from contiguous countries.

titles.title: Eliminating Narcotics and Drugs With Innovative Technology Act

To authorize funds for the use by the United States Customs Service of high energy container x-ray systems and automated targeting systems for inspection of cargo at major checkpoints along the borders of the United States that are contiguous with other countries.
